name: Grim-dark Card Master (Updated)
description: Battle through floors of enemies using Battle cards collected by defeating opponents to progress through the amazing dungeon environment. All character models were created in a stunning 32 by 32-pixel ratio resulting in an amazing amount of realistic detail hard to find in other games of this era. The turn-based action events provide a unique battle experience to each enemy encounter resulting in the need to strategically manipulate your party of cards to overcome your adversaries.
